title: No-Ritos
directions: Melt the butter and basically mix up all the ingredients together, and knead it into a ball. Take 2 sheets of baking paper, lay the ball on one, the other sheet on top and then flatten it out with a roller.
Cut triangles with a knife. Heat the oven to about 180C (350F) and bake for about 10 mins. Keep an eye on them so they don't burn. Turn the oven off and let them harden for about another 15 mins.
